subject: Mother's Day is Sunday, it's too late to mail her card adf
body:
MyFunCards com | Happy Mother's Day



Sent by TargaComm
It's too late to send her card in the mail 




Don't be a stranger! Use MyFunCards to send your mom a cute and fun card by email for Mother's Day, May 13. The great thing is that you can send ecards even on Mother's Day itself in case you forget. It's like a whole card store right at your fingertips.
Try it Today!
